Keywords: Avengers , Defenders , Mystical
Real Name: Stephen Strange
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) IT CHOSE ME: Dr. Strange starts the game with the Disney+ #s004 Cloak of Levitation equipped.
DEFENDER FOR A DAY: At the beginning of the game, choose up to two friendly characters that share a keyword with Dr. Strange and choose either Avengers Initiative team ability or Defenders team ability. The chosen characters can use the chosen team ability this game.

June 28, 2022
Bobcat2022
There are other figures - other Weird Steves, even - who do most of what this guy does, at a similar-or-lower point cost. The cape helps; at that point you're on par with the ADW title character (who got a boost from the 2021 rules changes). What makes this doc a specialist practitioner is the "Defender for a Day" trait. I love the idea of giving Defenders to characters that need it, though between Captain Carter's Shield and Spooktacular Wanda his best trick seems outclassed in his own set. Most of the Avengers in this set already have the Avengers Initiative TA, too... but in broader play he'll find a niche. Looking back on what I've written, it sounds like I'm down on the guy, but I do have a fondness for this piece. He's a competent secondary/tertiary attacker with a useful support power on every click and respectable survivability (you're not certain to see those last three clicks of Stealth/Regen, but the odds are decent). For "the main MCU Dr. Strange," he's solid.
June 9, 2022
tidge
Some current-era 75-point (or fewer!) figures may bias opinions negatively towards this dial, but I think this is a great dial for the character. I especially like the offensive potential without also having the all-too-common-for-the-character Mystics TA or Probability Control. the extra 5 points invested in the Cloak seems like a smart move in the era of fliers-carrying-fliers. I agree that typically being able to ignore terrain for ranged attacks (or Outwit) is a more useful choice, but sharing defense with move+attack (and possibly Sidestep) is a nice combo... it just may not mean much in this era of attack values.

May 16, 2022
bam
@ Goop I have to respectfully disagree. Sharing defense is really cool. The Defenders T.A. has members who have some 19s including the Cosmic Clash Silver Surfer who leads with it. Your other character could get a big boost. what is even crazier is that the new defenders member could have an 19 or a 20 like sharing defenders with KC Green Lantern & having your defenders team get a really big boost. The other option to give the Avengers Initiative T.A. is pretty cool too as you mentioned.. in a character that is relatively mobile is why I think it is pretty awesome. The only major shortcoming is the lack of 4 damage on the dial.
